    Class to handle creating and making request via REST to other banks

      • createConnection

        public java.net.HttpURLConnection createConnection(java.lang.String bankServiceAddress,
                                                   java.lang.String targetAccountNumber,

                                                   java.lang.String title,
                                                   int amount)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Method creating connection to other bank service
        Parameters:
        bankServiceAddress - Address to other bank
        targetAccountNumber - Account number to target account
        sourceAccountNumber - Account number from which the transfer is made
        title - Title of transfer
        amount - Amount in pennies
        Returns:
        HttpUrlConnection to other bank
        Throws:

      • makeRequest

        public boolean makeRequest(java.lang.String bankServiceAddress,
                           java.lang.String targetAccountNumber,
                           java.lang.String sourceAccountNumber,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           int amount)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           AccountServiceException
        Method to make request to other bank and analyze response codes
        Parameters:
        bankServiceAddress - Address to other bank
        targetAccountNumber - Account number to target account
        sourceAccountNumber - Account number from which the transfer is made
        title - Title of transfer
        amount - Amount in pennies
        Returns:
        true if response code 201, exception with messages and false if other response code
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        AccountServiceException - Exception with message on other response code than 201
